SELECT g.gd_no , g.gd_id , g.gd_name , g.gd_hp , gd_major1 , gd_major2 , gd_major3 , gd_major4 , gd_major5 , gd_major6 , gd_major7 , g.gd_picorg , ( SELECT (sum(star)/count(star)) FROM review WHERE gd_no = g.gd_no ) AS starAverage
, ( SELECT count(review) FROM review WHERE gd_no = g.gd_no ) AS reviewCount
, ( SELECT count(cancel_no) FROM cancel WHERE gd_no = g.gd_no ) AS cancelCount
, ( SELECT (count(rsv.reserve_no)- (SELECT count(cancel_no) FROM cancel c WHERE gd_no = g.gd_no ) ) FROM reservation rsv WHERE rsv.gd_no = g.gd_no ) AS reserveCount
FROM gd g
g.gd_acc = 1
AND g.gd_ableaddr Like '%${searchAbleaddr}%'
AND g.gd_name = #{searchName}
ORDER BY reviewCount DESC
ORDER BY reviewCount ASC
ORDER BY starAverage DESC
ORDER BY starAverage ASC
ORDER BY cancelCount DESC
ORDER BY cancelCount ASC
ORDER BY reserveCount DESC
ORDER BY reserveCount ASC

SELECT review_no , review_date , review , review_answer , review_answerdate , star , user_no , ( SELECT user_nick FROM user WHERE user_no = r.user_no ) AS user_nick FROM review r WHERE gd_no = #{gd_no} ORDER BY star DESC

SELECT r.reservable_no , r.reservable_date , r.reservable_hour , rm.reservable_major FROM reservable r INNER JOIN reservableMajor rm ON r.reservable_no = rm.reservable_no
reservable_do = 0 AND r.gd_no = #{gd_no}
AND r.reservable_date = #{selectDate}
AND (r.reservable_date BETWEEN #{dateStart} AND #{dateEnd})
AND (r.reservable_date <= #{dateEnd})
AND (r.reservable_date >= #{dateStart})
AND rm.reservable_major Like '%${searchMajor}%'
ORDER BY r.reservable_date ASC , r.reservable_hour ASC

SELECT r.reservable_date , r.reservable_hour , rm.reservable_major FROM reservable r INNER JOIN reservableMajor rm ON r.reservable_no = rm.reservable_no
reservable_do = 1 AND r.gd_no = #{gd_no}

SELECT count(completion_no) as completion_count FROM completion WHERE gd_no = #{gd_no}

SELECT gd_no , gd_email , gd_name , ROUND((TO_DAYS(NOW()) - (TO_DAYS(left(gd_regnum ,length(gd_regnum) - 1 )))) / 365) AS gd_age , gd_hp , gd_regdate , gd_ableaddr , ( SELECT gd_career FROM car WHERE gd_no = #{gd_no} ) AS gd_career , gd_picorg , gd_picreal , ( SELECT gd_certificate FROM cer WHERE gd_no = #{gd_no} ) AS gd_certificate , gd_acc , gd_major1 , gd_major2 , gd_major3 , gd_major4 , gd_major5 , gd_major6 , gd_major7 , ( SELECT (sum(star)/count(star)) FROM review WHERE gd_no = #{gd_no} ) AS starAverage FROM gd WHERE gd_no = #{gd_no}
